titleStmt.title: The doctrine of the Church of England concerning the independency of the clergy on the lay-power, as to those rights of theirs which are purely spiritual, reconciled, with our oath of supremacy, and the lay-deprivations of the popish-bishops in the beginning of the reformation / by the author of The vindication of the depriv'd bishops.
titleStmt.author: Dodwell, Henry, 1641-1711.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
